result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert L Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 3 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert L Robinson

BTC: VACATE WARRANT, reinstate bond.
Plea - G.
BTC: GUILTY.     15TR9236, 15TR9237, 15TR9235, 15TR9234 - Dismissed w/prej.

Jury trial at 01-07-2016 08:30 am.

BTC: Date set.  Jury trial scheduled for January 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in violation of agency requirements.

State does not object. 
BTC: Adjournment granted.

Attorney William J. Reddin in court.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Defense states that the Defendant is on his way and would like an adjourment and stay warrant as long as Defendant shows up today.

10:28am: Defendant appears in court. 
WARRANT VACATED 
BTC: Matter is adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in violation of agency requirements.
Status conference on August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert L Robinson
Current: 2415 N 41st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 06-16-2015)
Prior: 9061H North 95th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53224

Defendant Robert L Robinson in court with attorney William J. Reddin.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
